column1: Scotland's Census 2011 - National Records of Scotland
All people aged 16 and over in households

column2: All people aged 16 and over in households
column3: Living in a couple: Married or in a registered same-sex civil partnership
column5: Not living in a couple: Single (never married or never registered a same-sex civil partnership)
column6: Not living in a couple: Married or in a registered same-sex civil partnership
column7: Not living in a couple: Separated (but still legally married or still legally in a same-sex civil partnership)
column8: Not living in a couple: Divorced or formerly in a same-sex civil partnership which is now legally dissolved
column9: Not living in a couple: Widowed or surviving partner from a same-sex civil partnership

column1: For further information on variables, see www.scotlandscensus.gov.uk/variables

In order to protect against disclosure of personal information, some records have been swapped between different geographic areas.  Some cell values will be affected, particularly small values at the most detailed geographies.
